name: todo-webapp
description: A simple To-Do List web application that is made using React and asynchronously parses from a JSON file.

scripts.start: npm run static && npm run build src/index.html
scripts.static: npm run clean:dev && mkdir public && cp -R src/static/data public/data
scripts.build: npm run static && npx parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir public

author: Austin Doan
